description:
So basically to summarise, mainstream media warns us to:

1️⃣ Listen to celebrities about vaccines. Unless they are raising concerns about vaccines. Then don’t listen to them

2️⃣ Listen to doctors about vaccines. Unless they are raising concerns about vaccines. Then don’t listen to them

3️⃣ Listen to reputable sources of information. Unless they are raising concerns about vaccines. Then don’t listen to them

4️⃣ Listen to the people and organisations that have a vested interest in vaccine production. Because people who raise concerns about vaccines obviously have so much to gain from being ridiculed and marginalised by society
.
.
When is the mainstream media going to drop the “anti vaxxer” “conspiracy theorist” narrative?
It sounds like they’re getting a little desperate. Don’t you think?
.
.
@9news #avn #australia #vaccines #vaccination #experts #conspiracytheory #conspiracy #conspiracists #covid #covid19 #covid_19 #idonotconsent #DoUTrustUrGov
